# experimental data

[omics pred](https://www.omicspred.org/): an atlas of SNP effects (via ridge regression I believe) on mRNA levels, protein levels, and metabolite levels.

[causalDB](http://www.mulinlab.org/causaldb/index.html): at atlas of snp-trait associations with an emphasis on fine-mapping to identify causal SNP's

[human gene mutation database](https://www.hgmd.cf.ac.uk/)
